channel.title: How do i make it so an item apears when u get 99?
channel.description:
how do i make it so an item apears when u get 99?
plz help

item.title: How do i make it so an item apears when u get 99?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“devildude797, post:3, topic:165336”]if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You Get, What’s This??? Cash!”);
sendMessage(“And Pray XP OMFG”);
addItem(995, 20000);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[5]), 5);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

where do i put it?[/quote]

Why do you people always use this source? Anyways its not there.

Search this:

public void levelup(int skill)

Since thats prayer, Go to case 5:

case 5: // Prayer //sendFrame164(6242);

Under:

NpcDialogueSend = true;

Put:

if(playerLevel[5] >= 99) { addItem(itemId, amount); }

BEFORE the break;

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so an item apears when u get 99?

item.title: How do i make it so an item apears when u get 99?
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You Get, What’s This??? Cash!”);
sendMessage(“And Pray XP OMFG”);
addItem(995, 20000);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((15000*playerLevel[5]), 5);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

where do i put it?

item.title: How do i make it so an item apears when u get 99?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

In the levelup Method.

Put if(playerLevel[#] >= 99) {
addItem(itemId, amount);
}
